text:
Lazada eLogistics | Regional Head of Data | Singapore | Onsite | Full-time

We are looking for a technical leader to draw up the founding principles of data architecture, governance, and analytics in the logistics arm of South-East Asia's largest e-commerce platform, with prior senior leadership experience and familiar with a range of data platforms from PostgreSQL and relational databases to 'big data' stacks.

See the full JD here: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/516423939/

Please send a resume (or your LinkedIn profile) to irene.ling@lazada.com with '[your name] - Regional Head of Data - HN' as the subject line.
